item.title: Report: Hasbro Is Scrapping Dungeons & Dragons's Ambitious Virtual Tabletop - Gizmodo
item.description:

  3. D&D suffers more layoffs as Wizards cuts Sigil VTT staff by 90%  Polygon
  4. Wizards of the Coast reportedly lays off staff working on virtual tabletop Sigil  GeekWire
